Hey Dopeman.

Now I know I know I MUST be mistaken else that would prove the almighty god of torrents to be falible, and that would be a blasphemous act of heresy to Dopemanthiesm.  So could you help me?  Thanks bro.

-RoBobert a.k.a. "Emperor Bertabius"
